name: LastCall
description:
Last Call is a short game that is a cross between a visual novel and a bartending simulator. It was made in 2 days for GMTK Game Jam 2021.

You play as a bartender named Felix. Felix makes cocktails for his unusual customers and converses with them. Mostly, he just listens and lets them do all the talking. Help Felix make the right drinks to please his customers and possibly change their moods.


Customers' moods can change depending on what drink you make for them. There are different drinks you can unlock. Try to discover and unlock them all. Get to know the strange customers that show up in the quiet bar.

Meet and learn about 3 customers. Each different in their own way. Pour and mix different alcohols to make a range of different cocktails.

Credits 

Programming: Paku (Mary) - https://maryphun.itch.io/ 

Art and Character Design: squidcolas - https://squidcolas.itch.io/ 

Character Dialogue: Foxpancakes (Mandy) - https://foxpancakes.itch.io/

Music: TheShags 

Extra Helper: jorge0301
